acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 51257 was transferred by Dept. of Human Resource Management, 3/27/2014

controlaccess.corpname: Virginia. -- Dept. of Human Resource Management

scopecontent.p: Contains material relating to Governor James Gilmore's survey of state government employees in 1998. There is a sampling of surveys completed by state government employees, as well as correspondence relating to the execution of the survey and material relating to town hall meetings held in conjunction with the survey.
